episodes.title: Amid Epstein files fallout, photo company Lifetouch dropped by Pennsylvania school
episodes.description:
Schools are ending partnerships with the photo company Lifetouch after it came under fire for its connection to convicted child sex offender Jeffrey Epstein. According to the Mt. Pleasant Area School District, any photos scheduled for the spring have been canceled and they are looking for a new vendor for the 2026-27 school year. 


For video licensing inquiries, contact: licensing@veritone.com
